paper_abstract: One important task in the study of genome sequences is to determine densities of specific nucleotides and to understand the implications for exons or coding regions. Mathematical analysis of the large volume genomic DNA sequence data is one of the challenges for bio-scientists. In this manuscript, we introduce a novel method for visualizing and analyzing DNA sequences, the applications on mutation analysis and similarity analysis are presented in detail based on DC-curve (Delta coding curve).
paper_title: A Novel Method for Visualizing and Analyzing DNA Sequences
